message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great value for you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $1100000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value.

I understand you're looking to save money, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to come down to $980000, which is still a great deal for you. I believe the product's value will be worth it to you in the long run.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering the market value and your initial offer.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $950000, which is a compromise between our last two offers. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product. I think this is the best compromise considering the market value and our previous offers.
I've been patient, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $940000. This is my final offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
